name: Guntheidon
text: Ah, the Common Slime… not so common after all. You know, I’ve noticed they react the same way no matter what you put in front of them.

name: Guntheidon
text: Do they truly have no taste? Or perhaps they simply appreciate all culinary delights equally? Personally, I’m partial to a fine cheese… but I’ve been having great difficulty finding a minotaur amicable enough for me to milk it.
